          <title>
            <string language="nl">Discover Europe</string>
          </title>
          <language>nl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">On this site, which is esp. designed for students between the ages of 8 and 14, the young people can learn very much about numerous European aspects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">discovery</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Travel well</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">universal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Travelwell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eQNet</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>4</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auf dieser Site die besonders für Kursteilnehmer zwischen 
dem Alter von 8 und von 14 konzipiert ist, können die jungen Leute 
über zahlreiche europäische Aspekte sehr viel erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sur ce site, qui est en particulier conçu pour des 
étudiants entre les âges de 8 et de 14, les jeunes peuvent se 
renseigner infiniment sur de nombreux aspects européens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste local, que é projetado esp. para estudantes entre as 
idades de 8 e de 14, os povos novos podem aprender muito muito sobre 
aspectos europeus numerosos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Su questo luogo, che specialmente è progettato per gli 
allievi fra le età di 8 e di 14, i giovani possono imparare molto 
circa le funzioni europee numerose.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την περιοχή, που σχεδιάζεται ESP για τους σπουδαστές 
μεταξύ των ηλικιών 8 και 14, οι νέοι μπορούν να μάθουν πάρα 
πολύ για τις πολυάριθμες ευρωπαϊκές πτυχές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este sitio, que se diseña especialmente para los 
estudiantes entre las edades de 8 y 14, la gente joven puede aprender 
mucho sobre aspectos europeos numerosos.</string>
          </description>
